messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

reset approvals for pm approvals hi ask approvals holidays purchases etc receive requests currently receiving approvals others guess issue these approvals moved receive requests change please adjust procedure thanks head

I'm currently analyzing the provided IT ticket to determine the most appropriate category. My focus is on identifying keywords and context within the ticket description to align it with one of the predefined options. I'm leaning towards "HR Support" due to the mention of "holidays" and "approvals," which often fall under HR functions.
